rows.label: qev050304_MSG0010
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_JNK0010
rows.name: Speak

rows.label: qev050304_SEL0011
rows.name: Hail Ge Jewhe.

rows.label: qev050304_JNK0020
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev050304_SEL0021
rows.name: Take up a battle stance and go to Ge Jewhe's rescue.

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0001
rows.name:
Rrrgh! You are that meddler from before!
Come here to save me, have you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0002
rows.name:
Damn it all! Looking at this silver bracelet flooded my
mind with memories of her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0003
rows.name:
It made me scared to die. My legs are shaking,
my eyes blurred with tears... I could not go after him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0004
rows.name:
It is a sorry excuse for a warrior who comes this far
only to lose their nerve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050304_SEL0031
rows.name: Laugh at Ge Jewhe's lack of fortitude.

rows.label: qev050304_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050304_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Ge Jewhe that she made the right decision.

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yes, laugh. Caper and dance. My actions have earned
me that and more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0006
rows.name: I am a warrior! This is anything but right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0007
rows.name:
And though it shames me, it seems I need your help.
Seeing that bracelet reminded me of all I have to lose,
and I cannot keep my promise if I die here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_MSG0008
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050304_JNK0050
rows.name: Speak

rows.label: qev050304_SEL0051
rows.name: Hail Ge Jewhe.

rows.label: qev050304_JNK0060
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev050304_SEL0061
rows.name: Take up a battle stance and go to Ge Jewhe's rescue.
